Tiger
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Library: Fan Fiction, Poetry, Birthday List, Links & Non-Fiction Archive: Poetry: Tiger
By RaystormX on Friday, March 18, 2005 - 11:24 pm:

Inspired by the book, "love that dog"

Under a Mock Tree
Fang lies down
Lolls his limp
Toungue, yawns,
Rests his long chin
Carefully between
Front paws;
Looks up, lazily,
Chops, with
Jaws, at a slow worm,
Blinks, rolls
On his side,
Sighs, closes
His eyes: sleeps
All Afternoon
Under the mock tree
In his Blue coat.

By Dragon's soul on Monday, March 21, 2005 - 10:58 am:

I like it. Sounds like my dogs.
